## fit01 variable

Inline function. Fits value `a` in \[0..1\] interval to new interval \[b..c\]. No clamping performed. Same as `mix(b, c, a)`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fit01: <A extends Prim, B extends A, C extends B>(a: Term<A>, b: Term<B>, c: Term<C>) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").FnCall<A>
```
